content.title: Give
content.description: Jesus called us to a life of radical generosity. Your commitment to regular giving is creating the future we want to see.

content.header2: Jesus called us to a life of radical generosity. Your commitment to regular giving is creating the future we want to see.
content.text3: • care for others in our communities and beyond
content.text4: • go into our neighbourhoods to introduce spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centred life
content.text5: When we partner with God, the impacts are far greater than what we could do on our own. Thank you for giving!
